title: Pet Friendly House with Yard close to UofPenn, New Kitchen
description:
Welcome to this beautiful cozy townhome with old world charm and character at the end of a cul-de-sac. Great two-bedroom property with complete privacy right in the middle of the city.
This house has original heart of pine wooden floors and features a spiral staircase. Exposed brick accent wall in the living room with plenty of natural light. Brand new bathroom and renovated kitchen in 2021. Built in washer and dryer unit on the first floor and plenty of storage in the basement.
Spacious brick back patio with a large Magnolia tree that gives this back yard shade and privacy in the summer.
This house is pet friendly.
The house is only two blocks from the market street El, which gives easy access to Center City and elsewhere. Easy walking distance to University of Pennsylvania, Drexel University, Clark Park, playgrounds, shopping and grocery stores. Additionally, there are multiple dining and entertainment options within walking distance. Major highways and access to center city and the airport is just minutes away.
Phone interviews first before touring.
For the safety of everyone, mask must be warn when touring the property and hand sanitizer.
Background checks are done with National Tenant Network for all candidates. There is a security deposit and background check fee.
Lease ends August 30, 2023

title: Large Mother-in-law Suite with New kitchen, Cat Friendly
description:
The apartment is a mother-in-law suite, which means you go through the owners house to get to the apartment.The only thing you share is a washer and dryer. Because of that, we are being really careful who we rent to. We would prefer a couple or single person, who loves their own space, but will respect our space as they go through.
Huge One bedroom apartment with an extra room that can be curtained off or used as a den. The apartment has tons of gorgeous natural light. There are six closets in the apartment so it has a lot of storage. Hardwood floors through out. Balcony overlooking the corner of 48th and Cedar.
New kitchen with granite countertops, subway tile, and appliances. Garage disposal too.
Cats are ok, but no dogs. We have a dog though so you must like dogs.
There is a Washer and Dryer in the building. Tenants pay electrical and gas. Gas bill is only for the stove.
This apartment is a block from Baltimore Avenue, 4 blocks from Clark Park, a block from Mariposa Grocery store, Local Pez, Gold Standard, and near many restaurants and bars. Its a great family friendly neighborhood with large trees.
Call Mike to set up an appointment. No calls before 9 am or after 9 pm

title: Renovated Studio Apartment Home, Wood Floors, City View, Package Room
description:
The studio apartment home at 1006 is available for lease at this moment! This 400 square foot Dali studio apartment home on the 10th floor features large windows that face north and have a city view. You may gaze upon skyscrapers like BNY Mellon Center, Comcast Center, One Liberty Place, and Two Liberty Place. This renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite countertops. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. The renovated bathroom tile is white. This home has wood floors. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home as early as December 7, 2022!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Trader Joe's, Giant, Target, Di Bruno Bros., Reading Terminal Market, Giant Heirloom Market, Aldi, Sprouts, and Whole Foods. Browse the books at Barnes & Noble. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, gorjana, Paper Source, Philadelphia Runner, Allbirds, Vince, Theory, MAC Cosmetics, Sephora, and Nordstrom Rack. Dine out at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, Pietro's, Pizzeria Vetri, Luke's Lobster Rittenhouse, Tria Cafe Rittenhouse, a.kitchen, Spice Finch, HipCityVeg, The Love, Via Locusta, The Dandelion, The Continental Mid-town, and Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Savor a coffee at La Colombe, Ultimo, Alchemy, and Elixr. Have a beautiful French dessert at Miel Patisserie. Indulge in a decadent Sunday brunch at Green Eggs. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in ice cream at Van Leeuwen and Jeni's. Stroll across the park and then buy a baguette at Metropolitan Bakery or pick up a turkey club at Marathon on the Square. Grab scones from The Bakeshop on 20th. Catch a show at one of the many nearby theaters. Wander around the Rodin Museum or Barnes Foundation. Relax with a manicure and pedicure at Philly Nails Bar, Nail Spa Bar, or Coco Blue Spruce. Shop at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday from 9 to 2. There is so much to do in this area!

title: This home is a DREAM city-dwelling, through and through!
description:
AMAZING, NEW, LUXURIOUS - three words to describe this tri-level condo unit in a spectacular location in Fishtown. This home is a DREAM city-dwelling, through and through! Located on the first floor, so carrying in groceries & bags is a BREEZE. Enter into the unit to find an expansive open first floor with top of the line amenities. You'll absolutely love the modern kitchen with Carrera style counter tops, stand alone island with ample seating, and stainless steel appliances. Floor to ceiling windows in the living/dining room combination allow for an extra sun-soaked space. Through the sliding glass doors you'll find an EXTRA LARGE outdoor space that is RARE in the city. The space includes an expansive deck and patio furniture for entertaining friends and your furry loved ones. This is a dog-owners DREAM space! Upstairs you'll find a powder room, perfect for guests to use when you're entertaining. On the top floor is a SPACIOUS bedroom with walk-in closet and en-suite bathroom. The shower is spacious and includes a bench. This bathroom is totally updated with modern finishes, and the bedroom is big enough for a sleeping space AND an office. On the way downstairs, you'll find extra storage containers - you won't run out of room in this city condo! Downstairs you'll find another extra large bedroom with a huge window for sunlight, which could also double as a sleeping space + office - or even a home gym! Double closet and another ensuite bathroom are included down here. This space is PERFECT for roommates, as you'll each have extra privacy and your own bathrooms. The laundry room is also located downstairs, with a newer washer/dryer. This home is walking distance to Frankford Avenue and all Fishtown has to offer. Penn Treaty park is directly across the street (did we say dog-friendly?!) -- and street parking is a breeze around here as no permits are required! This one is hard to beat - schedule your showing today!

Kitchens include custom cabinetry with soft-close drawers throughout, quartz counters, slab backslashes and mood setting under cabinet lighting. Bathrooms feature an exhilarating waterfall rain shower head with hand-held spray wands and body jets, shower benches and glass doors, illuminated medicine cabinets and storage vanities. Apartments can be found in the dark modern scheme Sleek design, the bright contemporary Scandinavian design or the warm Timeless design. There is absolutely no wrong way to live luxurious. Also, the fitness center offers relaxing his and her spas with high pressure showers, dry saunas, steam rooms, stand up tanning, and hydro massage beds. Enjoy a cup of coffee at the stylish diner booths, kick back on a comfortable couch with friends or take in beautiful city views from the outdoor terrace. title: Modern Fishtown 3 Bedroom, 3 Bathroom Home
description:
Available September 2022!
This beautiful three-story home is located in the heart of Fishtown, which Forbes Magazine described as one of the best neighborhoods to live in the U.S.!
The home has a recently remodeled kitchen with a ton of natural lighting, stainless steel appliances, a built in dishwasher and a wrap around counter for eating, working or hanging out.
There is hard wood flooring throughout the home with a smart Nest thermostat which operates the gas heat and electric central air conditioning. Water is included in your rent. There is full semi-finished basement for storage and laundry.
The patio is also in the process of an update, with a new Moroccan style, tiled wall being built. Included are older and recent pictures of the yard to give you a sense of the space.
There are a total of three bedrooms and two full bathrooms. The second floor has one large bedroom and one smaller bedroom, as well as a full bathroom. The third floor master bedroom runs the entire length of the house and also has it's own newly renovated full bathroom with a large soaking bathtub.
This listing is furnished, but if you prefer unfurnished, let us know!
Parking:
There's street parking available with no time limit and no permit required.
We are walking distance to the Market-Frankford line, which will quickly take you to Center City, University City, Old City, South Philly, and more ($2.25 token fee). Lyft and Uber are always nearby and typically arrive in ~3 minutes. We are also close to I 95 as well.
Popular nearby:
Fishtown is one of the best neighborhoods in Philly! We are walking distance to some of the greatest cafes, bars and restaurants in both Fishtown and Northern Liberties:

title: Luxury 3BD/3Bath New Construction House! Available August 2022
description:
Newly constructed spacious house for rent! Special attention has been given to each and every detail in the building of this state-of-the-art home. Located in the Grays Ferry section of South Philadelphia, in close proximity to University of Pennsylvania, High way I-76 and the retail corridor, this home is surrounded by numerous new constructions and recent rehab projects.
This gorgeous home has 3 bedrooms with 3 custom bathrooms. The home boasts hardwood flooring, recessed lighting, smoke/carbon monoxide detectors, fire-sprinkler system, and is also cable ready. Enter the home to be greeted by a well-lit and spacious grand living room. Past the sun-lit grand living room you will find your state-of-the-art open galley kitchen. The beautifully appointed kitchen is outfitted with soft-close cabinets, modern Quartz counter-tops, contemporary backsplash, deep sink with chef's faucet, SS Samsung appliance package (dishwasher, fridge, range, microwave), and under cabinet lighting. From the kitchen via you will find the entrance to your private backyard. From the first floor, commercial grade Pine staircases (secured by custom railing) lead you up to the 2nd level of the house. Here the home presents a large room with a spacious organized closet, a huge bathroom with a custom vanity set, and laundry room. Following the staircase to the 3rd level, you enter to your own private oasis. The 3rd floor has another large bedroom, custom spa-like bathroom, and a spacious closet! The master bath boasts custom tile-work, dual vanity set, soaking tub and a designer rainfall shower. Take another step up the stairs to the pilot-house where you will find the access to your private dual rooftop decks. The home has electric and water lines on the rooftop, making it an ideal area to host parties and get-togethers. The finished basement offers another spacious bedroom or home office, custom full bathroom, and utility closet.
Extra included bonuses: Large High Energy Efficient windows, Built-in (Bluetooth enabled) speakers in living room & master bedroom, energy efficient DUAL zoned HVAC, organized closet shelving system, Nest camera in front and rear of home, Schlage keyless door lock in front, LED recessed lighting, digital thermostats, and much more! MUST SEE! Home has approximately 1850 SqFt of living space. Located close to public transportation, highway, nightlife, grocery stores, and restaurants.

Seeking Nanny Position for household in trade for nice room , storage , BATHTUB , in trade for your needs , child care , cooking , cleaning , paying bills , errands , carpentry skills , I can fix and address all your needs , I have many talents to trade.
I study Ballet and seek to live as close to Studio West Ballet Academy and Theater as possible in very loving kind environment in your home .
I am Ms Kelly Aleksandra Grace , and I must Dance and must have help achieving this goal , I recently became homeless and need off these horrid streets , my life is in danger , help me please .
Rental Home Wanted- 2 or 3bdrm in Cottage Grove. Retired couple very responsible, very clean and very dependable. We need a long-term rental house or duplex. We have a smaller mature dog 12lbs, very well-mannered, and house trained. We like yardwork and have all the equipment. Have excellent references, credit, and criminal history.
I am an 30 year old artist going to start school again in the fall at central Oregon community college. I am looking to rent the upcoming school year in a nice attic space, side space or basement space that is good for quiet study. I keep to myself, but can be very available and kind in social settings. I have a car but would like my commute to cocc to be easy. My budget is 500-700 for rent. I do have my bed and sewing machine table that I would need to accommodate. I am unfortunately not looking for shared housing with a bunch of people as I am looking for a quiet environment to study. A family home with a rentable private space would be perfect. (Needs to respect lgbt) Thank you!
Hello,
I am seekinga roomate for Nov 1st to rent a house with. I am a single adult in my mid thirties trying to live in Bend at a reasonable rate somewhere that is more than 500 square feet. I am very active and not home often but when I am home I like having more than 500 square feet to live in. I get along with everyone but I don't drink alot or smoke weed. I really just work out and play guitar and work. I'm also LGBT so if your homophobic than we are not a good fit. I look forward to hearing from anyone interested who fits the description!
We are two 21 year-old seeking a third roommate to join our housing search. We are hoping to find an affordable place in Bend or Redmond, and move in by October 1st.
I am from Bend, and currently going to school full-time. I enjoy art, yoga, and spending time outdoors. My friend (the other roommate) is from Idaho, and she works full-time in Bend. She enjoys hiking, paddle boarding, reading and taking care of her (many) plants. We both live in Redmond now, but because of our plans for school/work, would prefer to find a place in Bend to avoid the commute.
Both of us are non-smokers (no cigarettes or weed) and we would consider a cat, but prefer to not have pets. Our goal is to have a clean and relaxing home-base for everyone. So we should all feel welcome to have friends over, but avoid becoming a party house or having excessive overnight guests.
Our budget is 700-800 (lower if possible) and we will likely be signing a 6-12 month lease. We are both responsible/financially stable, and looking for another reliable person.
Hi there! I am transferring back to Bend (I’ve only been away two years and are VERY happy to be coming back) through my work (The American Red Cross) and are in need of a room or someone to split a place with around mid November. I’ve been with the Red Cross for 14yrs, have a credit score over 800, and will qualify for up to 1200/mo on an application but really don’t want to spend more than 900/mo for rent (including utilities).
I just thought I’d put myself out there in CL land to see if I could start networking since most if not all the rooms-for-rent ads are looking to fill in September right now. I start work in Bend early October and have secured a sublet/temp through November 15th which is when I’ll need a permanent living situation.
About me: I have , , non-smoker, occasional drinker, definitely no drugs, get up and go to bed early, single, don’t go “out” at night and love to recreate outside. I come with a mountain bike, a paddle board, camp and backpack gear, and of course, my Subaru, Patagonia bag and Kuhl puffy coat;) I guess I’m technically middle aged, but perhaps still in denial lol. Oh! I also house/dog sit on the side therefore occasionally won’t even be home for periods of time. I’m very considerate, respectful and responsible and for the most part keep to myself. I like to garden, hike, bike, take photos, read, and eat good food! I am cordial and friendly but aren’t expecting to be best friends, just wanting to share a space in order to live in an affordable, decent way.
Some expectations in a roommate: Just common sense stuff like, please don’t bang pots and pans together while I’m trying to sleep, please don’t bring random strangers over to “party” or stay the night, please clean up the kitchen after you make a meal, please take turns deep cleaning common areas, please don’t be a drug addict or alcoholic and steal stuff. I don’t mind having occasional get togethers as I may have a friend or two over once in a while for dinner or something, but I don’t want to live in a “party” or dirty house. I work a lot and will need and want a peaceful, positive environment to rest and rejuvenate.
Hi, my name is Yolanda, and I’m in need of a room to rent in any of the cities I have listed, I am currently living in Yakima, and trying to leave a bad toxic living situation up here and be back down living near all my family in Auburn. I can pay 500, maybe up to 550, and once I’m able to get situated and find a job I can pay more.
I’m 26, been told I’m very easy going, kind, with a “momma bear” nature. I can be very introverted and shy at first, but once I’m comfortable I open up to being my silly, weird, quirky true self. I’m a gamer for life type, and a homebody. I’m waaaaay past my party days, so you don’t have to worry about me bringing random people over and partying.
I can slip up and be a bit loud from raging/excitement with video games, but it’s not constant. I am Demi-Pansexual, so a household that is LGTBTQ+ friendly would be best.
If you think I’d be a good fit for your room, email me with a bit about you, the room, and any other questions you may have about me. Thankies for taking the time to read this. ✨

title: Luxury 2 Bedroom 2 Bathroom Apartment Home with Washer and Dryer, Gym
description:
The home at 1602 is a 1,180 square foot Da Vinci two bedroom two bathroom apartment home in a building located on Rittenhouse Square! This home on the 16th floor has windows that face east for morning sunshine and afternoon shade and have a view looking down Walnut Street with skyscrapers to the left. The beautiful kitchen and bathrooms are definitely a must see! There is also abundant closet space for plenty of storage. Experience the convenience of having a combination washer and dryer inside your new home! Move into your new home as early as August 31, 2022!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to stores and restaurants! Target, Giant, Trader Joe's, Sue's Produce Market, Rittenhouse Market, Spruce Food Market, Di Bruno Bros., Aldi, Sprouts, and Whole Foods are grocery stores within walking distance! Shop at the retail stores of Rittenhouse Row such as Barnes & Noble, Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Tiffany & Co., Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Paper Source, L'Occitane, J. Crew, Philadelphia Runner, Allbirds, Vince, Urban Outfitters, Boyds, Banana Republic Factory, MAC Cosmetics, Sephora, and Nordstrom Rack. Nearby dining options include: Rouge, Parc, Barclay Prime, Pietro's Coal Oven Pizzeria, Devon Seafood Grill, Aleksandar, a.kitchen, Spice Finch, Via Locusta, The Love, Marathon Grill, Marathon on the Square, The Continental Mid-town, Gran Caffe L'Aquila, Joe's Pizza, and Alice Pizza. Sip a delicious coffee at La Colombe, Ultimo, Alchemy, Elixr, Di Bruno Bros., and Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in a beautiful French dessert at Miel Patisserie. Indulge in ice cream from Van Leeuwen or Jeni's. Stroll across the park and then buy a loaf of artisanal bread from Metropolitan Bakery. Wander around the Mütter Museum. Relax with a manicure or pedicure at Philly Nails Bar. Shop at the farmer's market at Rittenhouse Square every Tuesday and Saturday form 9:00 AM to 2:00 PM! There is so much to do in this area!
Community Features:
* Top-of-the-line fitness center
* 8,000 square foot resident lounge with free wifi
* Fitness/yoga studio
* Sauna
* Package room
* Bike storage
* Pet-friendly building complete with a dog spa! Please note that certain restrictions apply.
* Elevator building with 24/7 front door attendant and concierge desk staff
* Amazing roof deck with fantastic views
* Laundry room on every floor
* Large laundry facility on the 3rd floor
* Attached parking garage! Please note that these parking spaces are not owned nor managed by community and the cost is separate.
Apartment Home Features:
* Unfurnished two bedroom two bathroom apartment home on the 16th floor
* Combination washer and dryer
* Spacious closets
* Large east-facing windows
* City view
* Wood floors
* Renovated kitchen
* White kitchen cabinets
* Granite kitchen counters
* Dishwasher
* Disposal
* Gas stove
* Microwave drawer
* Beautiful bathrooms with Italian tile
* Spacious home at 1,180 square feet
* All utilities included (except cable and internet)
To see if this home is still available for lease, go to our website to see if 1602 is still listed under the Da Vinci floor plan. Please make an appointment to tour with Michelle using ResMate, our chatbot concierge, on our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com 24/7. Live virtual tours in Zoom available!
Rittenhouse Claridge
201 South 18th Street
Philadelphia, PA 19103
Visit our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com for the most up-to-date availability!
Price posted is for the 22 month lease term.
2-22 month lease terms available!
Rental rates, availability, and apartment home features are subject to change without notice.
Welcome home!
